test datasets. Starting with the model, we must deﬁne a separate CNN model for each of the
eight input variables. The conﬁguration of the model, including the number of layers and their
hyperparameters, were also modiﬁed to better suit the new approach. The new conﬁguration is
not optimal and was found with a little trial and error. The multi-headed model is speciﬁed
